A Legacy Rooted in Nature

Discover the heart and philosophy behind Swastham Ayurveda.

A Legacy of Ayurvedic Excellence

About Dr. Sasi Keezhattupurath

With over 32 years of clinical expertise, Dr. Sasi is a respected Ayurvedic physician known for his ability to bridge the ancient principles of Ayurveda with modern approaches to health. His journey began with a rigorous seven-and-a-half-year Gurukula program at Ayurveda College, Coimbatore.

  • Specializes in: Holistic management of chronic diseases, rejuvenation, women’s health, stress disorders, and geriatric care.
  • Patient-Centered Approach: Renowned for making Ayurveda accessible, compassionate, and effective for modern health needs.
  • Global Reach: Trusted by a diverse international clientele from the UK, Europe, USA, Mauritius, and the Middle East.

Our Guiding Principles

Our Mission & Vision

Our Mission

To empower you on your journey to optimal health with personalized treatments, education, and support, helping you live a life of balance, vitality, and joy.

Our Vision

To create a world where authentic Ayurveda empowers every individual to live with vitality, harmony, and purpose.

Our Patient-First Philosophy

Our Commitment & Approach

Our team of highly skilled physicians and dedicated professionals is committed to helping you achieve optimal health and well-being. We provide a comfortable, safe, and understanding environment where you are at the center of all that we do.

At Swastham Ayurveda, we understand that no two healing journeys are alike. That’s why we:

  • Conduct comprehensive assessments of your constitution (Prakriti), imbalances (Vikriti), lifestyle, and health history.
  • Design personalized treatment plans that align with your individual health goals and comfort level.
  • Offer both in-depth therapies and practical lifestyle solutions to ensure accessibility and effectiveness.
  • Create a nurturing, safe, and supportive healing space where you feel heard, valued, and empowered.

Our Core Values

Compassion & Empathy

Treating everyone with understanding and sensitivity.

Collaboration

Working with patients and colleagues as partners in healing.

Humility & Respect

Creating a nurturing environment through respect and humility.

Authenticity

Preserving traditional wisdom while addressing modern needs.

Find the Swastham Difference

Where ancient wisdom meets modern wellness. Immerse yourself in the art of authentic Ayurveda at Swastham.

Reconnect with Your Essence

Find profound peace and balance through time-honored Panchakarma and other Ayurvedic practices. Experience the healing power of traditional medicines. Savor the aromas of herbs as they gently soothe your body and mind.

Embrace Transformation

Experience holistic rejuvenation, addressing your physical, mental, and emotional well-being through personalized consultations, yoga therapy, and more.

Become Part of a Community

Connect with fellow seekers and our compassionate team, sharing experiences and finding support on your wellness journey.

Our Sanctuary of Serenity

A glimpse into our healing space, designed for your comfort and peace.

Your Peaceful Retreat in Kerala

Swastham is located in the quiet village of Kavumvatam, near the historic city of Koyilandi, Kozhikode. Filled with greenery and serenity, it's the perfect place to relax and rejuvenate. Here, you'll enjoy fresh air, the peaceful sounds of nature, and a calming environment for healing.

Your trusted partner in holistic health and wellness, providing authentic Ayurvedic treatments in Calicut.
